channel.title: Matrix source hacking accounts?
channel.description: so I was on a server that's base is matrix. a level 3 logged in and must have done something because shortly after me talking to them i saw a whisper from them saying their password and a whisper that said was sent from me to them saying mine.was booted off server about 2-4 seconds later. I cant seem to find anything on this and wondering how can I put a stop to this there must have been something in administer panel I don't know about.

item.title: Matrix source hacking accounts?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“gimpie, post:7, topic:518611”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=636876.msg4293744#msg4293744 date=1367826826]
http://netty.io/downloads.html

Download the correct version for your server. The matrix version has some code hidden within the netty api to transmit passwords
[/quote]
The same player does this to my server to, i hate sounding like a noob but what do i do with that netty download?[/quote]
Just replace your existing files with the ones from the download.

Read full topic
